title: Analyze template structure and API integration requirements

requirements: Analyze fe_template/boilerplate-shadcn-pro-main/ structure: 4 directories (app/, components/, lib/, hooks/, contexts/)
Review 16 API endpoints across 4 categories: image_generation (5 endpoints), user_management (5 endpoints), admin_panel (6 endpoints), authentication (3 endpoints)
Document 7 existing files in public/ to be deleted: index.html, login.html, styles/ (4 files), scripts/ (2 files)
Map 4 API capability groups with their specific endpoints and data structures
acceptance: Template structure documented: verify by ls fe_template/boilerplate-shadcn-pro-main/ | wc -l >= 4
API endpoints cataloged: verify by counting documented endpoints = 16
Page requirements mapped: verify by counting key pages = 8
Files-to-delete inventory complete: verify by counting listed files = 7

shared_context.conventions: HCI-based design with minimal cognitive load

artifacts.usage: API capabilities and current frontend structure analysis

pre_analysis.action: Load context package for comprehensive analysis
Examine template directory structure and components
Review Express routes to understand API structure

implementation_approach.title: Document template architecture
implementation_approach.description: Create comprehensive documentation of template structure, dependencies, and component patterns
modification_points: Document 4 main directories: app/, components/, lib/, hooks/, contexts/
List template configuration files: package.json, components.json
logic_flow: Analyze directory structure with file counts
Document component architecture and routing setup
Identify integration points with backend APIs
